column6: Super Bowl H Town Ready!!!!!!!\n3600 sqft single family home located at 5121 A Polk St, Houston, TX 77023 Eado Houston,TX just minutes from downtown in the new artistic division of eastend Houston called EADO. 2 large bedrooms, 1 bath, kitchen, Dining room, living room (closes with french doors), bathroom.\nNetlfis and Wifi!
